description: Connect your Google Business Profile to manage reviews, respond to customers, create posts, and handle multiple locations—all from your Prompt Reviews dashboard.

key_features.title: Review Management
key_features.description: View and respond to Google reviews directly from Prompt Reviews. Track review trends and maintain your reputation with quick response capabilities.

key_features.title: Posts & Updates
key_features.description: Create and schedule Google Business Profile posts about updates, offers, and events. Keep your profile active and engaging.

key_features.title: Multiple Locations
key_features.description: Manage multiple business profiles from one dashboard. Perfect for franchises and multi-location businesses with centralized control.

key_features.title: Review Import
key_features.description: Import existing Google reviews to feature on your website, launch double-dip campaigns, or track customer engagement.

how_it_works.title: Grant Permissions
how_it_works.description: Authorize Prompt Reviews to access your business information, reviews, and posting capabilities. We only request the minimum permissions needed.

how_it_works.title: Select Your Business
how_it_works.description: Choose which business location(s) to connect. You can add more locations later if needed. Perfect for multi-location businesses.

best_practices.title: Respond Quickly to Reviews
best_practices.description: Google rewards businesses that respond within 24 hours with increased visibility. Quick responses improve your local search ranking and show customers you care.

best_practices.title: Keep Responses Personal
best_practices.description: Avoid generic copy-paste responses. Thank customers by name, address specific concerns, and include your business name naturally in responses.

best_practices.title: Post Regularly
best_practices.description: Keep your Google Business Profile active with weekly posts about updates, offers, and events. Posts appear for 7 days, so maintain a consistent schedule.

best_practices.title: Handle Negative Reviews Professionally
best_practices.description: Address concerns professionally without arguing. Offer to resolve issues offline and show potential customers how you handle problems.
